alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Patrick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 2:38PM EST until January 06 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Surry County. In Virginia, Carroll County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads and sidewalks will become slick and hazardous. Bridges and overpasses will be most susceptible to ice. Ice accumulations on trees and power lines may result in downed tree limbs and isolated power outages.
info.instruction: Plan on hazardous travel conditions. Reduce speed and allow extra time to reach your destination. Postpone travel if possible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
